    static int
    addAppointment(Connection connection, Appointment appointment)
    This method is used to add appointments to the appointment table and returns a new set of appointments (via the getAppointmentsFromResultSet method) since the database generates the appointment id, the RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS is used to display the new appointment id when the user returns to the dashboard.

    • getMonthAppointmentsByUserId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getMonthAppointmentsByUserId(Connection connection, int userId) throws SQLException
      This method gets all appointments from the appointment table. the database query finds appointments for the month identified. This is used to populate the month tables
      Parameters:
      userId - defines the user id # to find the associated appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getWeekAppointmentsByUserId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getWeekAppointmentsByUserId(Connection connection, int userId) throws SQLException

      Parameters:

    • getAppointmentsFromResultSet

      private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsFromResultSet(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      This method creates a new list of appointments, which is used to populate the month and week tables and get the table of appointments based on a contact id.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments(Connection connection) throws SQLException

      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getCustomerAppointments

      public static boolean getCustomerAppointments(Connection connection, int customerId, LocalDateTime newStart, LocalDateTime newEnd) throws SQLException
      This method returns appointments based on a customer id.This is used inside the appointment dao to locate overlapping appointments for customers. While there are existing appointments for the customer, the list will continue to populate if an appointment starts before another appointment ends, an error is printed. this is used in the AddAppointmentController to generate an alert when the usr has overlapping appointments
      Parameters:
      customerId - is used to identify the customer's appointment(s) being searched.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getContactAppointmentsById

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getContactAppointmentsById(Connection connection, int contactId) throws SQLException
      This method is used to retrieve all the contacts from the contact table and returns a new set of appointments (via the getAppointmentsFromResultSet method)
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addAppointment

      public static int addAppointment(Connection connection, Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      This method is used to add appointments to the appointment table and returns a new set of appointments (via the getAppointmentsFromResultSet method) since the database generates the appointment id, the RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS is used to display the new appointment id when the user returns to the dashboard.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllMonthAppointmentsByCustomer

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllMonthAppointmentsByCustomer(Connection connection, int customerId, Month month, String type) throws SQLException
      This method is used to create a list of all appointments for a customer in a specified month. This method is used in the customer reports controller.
